page.title: 19TRANSPORT, HASELOR, WARKS.
page.content: As there is no public transport that serves Haselor we thought we should like to know what type of transport people used.We asked 'How many cars do your family own?' A * represents 01 family. 00 cars ** 01 cars ******* 02 cars ******** 03 cars * 04 cars * It is interesting that there are as many 2-car families as there are. The families that have no cars stated they used a bicycle or relied on relatives to go anywhere. Bicycle ownership: 00 bikes ****** 04 bikes *** 01 bikes *** 05 bikes 02 bikes *** 06 bikes * 03 bikes *** 07 bikes+1tandem *
